base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Custom Fields
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentCustomFields:
    custom_fields:
    - Agent_Custom1
    - Agent_Custom2
    - Agent_Custom3
    - Agent_Custom4
    - Agent_Custom5
    - Agent_Custom6
    model: agent
    only:
    - hostname
  clientCustomFields:
    custom_fields:
    - Client_Custom1
    model: client
    only:
    - name
  siteCustomFields:
    custom_fields:
    - Site_Custom1
    model: site
    only:
    - name
